name: P-Link.io MCP Server
description: Send and receive money on Solana, converts any email or phone number into a wallet, requesting payment (creating x402 compliant payment links, payment pages for humans and bots), get wallet balance or see transaction history.

tools.name: get_wallet_and_api_key
tools.description: Create wallet for this email and get API_KEY

tools.name: fund_my_wallet
tools.description: Get the different ways in order to fund your wallet

tools.name: send_money
tools.description: Send money to an email, Solana wallet or phone number.

tools.name: request_payment_link
tools.description: Create a payment link in order to request a payment to your account

tools.name: get_my_wallet_info
tools.description: Retrieve the wallet infos about the connected P-Link account (Solana wallet address, Balance)

tools.name: get_transaction_state
tools.description: Retrieve the state and details of a transaction using Solana trx ID

tools.name: get_wallet_history
tools.description: Retrieve list of the transactions related to my Solana wallet

tools.name: pay_and_get_402_protected_url
tools.description: Pay a HTTP 402 protected URL using your P-Link managed account, and returns the result
